about_the_game:
A PDF collection of the planning, sketching, and writing for Prism. For those who wish to show extra support or have an interest in the creative process that went into making the game.

A look into:

  • Pencil drawings of scenes & characters
  • The original script with hand-marked edits
  • Miscellaneous notes & thoughts

Warning, this collection contains major spoilers. Playing through the game first is highly recommended.

content_descriptors.notes: Written and visual depictions of blood, violence, death, and surgery that some users may find disturbing.
